Articles.Content:
False.

The user below is evil.

True, as are we all, if you go by various religious definitions.

The person below me isn't getting out of here alive.

false

the user below me is actualy a kerbal!

False. I am but a shadow of the ether.

The user below me is familiar with the user above me.

False.

The user below noticed the double post up top.

True.

The user below me has not yet reached the end of the tech tree.

True.

The user below me has never gone beyond Eeloo's orbit.

False, although I have never been to Eeloo proper.

The user below me knows Macey Dean.

who

the user below me knows scott manly

I know of him.

The user below does not.

false

the user below me is procrastinating.

Maybe... Probably true :/

The user below me is from Greenland

Nope, false.

The user below understands the quadratic equation.

True. (I hate it).

The user below me also dislikes maths but understands that the applications of it are extremely useful, such as in KSP.

Mmmm. Indifferent. Maths is not difficult for me at all, really. Some of the higher-order stuff, and complex physics equations take a bit to understand, but it's not really that difficult for me. It just bores me, is all.

The user below is not yet out of school.

True

The user below me doesn't play sports

True, i'm lazy.

The user bellow me is a secret illegal sentient program...LET'S GET 'EM!!!

False.

The user below has seen Whackjob's latest quote-unquote "project"...

Eeyup. Exercises in absurdity have their uses, now and again.

The user below thinks Whackjob's project is silly.

I reserve judgement until I can see the images. But so far, no.

The user below is a paradox.

Both True and False.

The user below me has never posted a thread in the suggestions section of the forums.

True.

The user below me has no programming knowledge whatsoever.

well outside of messing with cfgs in Ksp well true

the user below me does have programming knowledge

True, though it is very VERY limited.

The user below me was also a casualty of The Great Crumble of 2013.

Ehehehehehehe NOPE. I was around long, long before that. I took a hiatus over that time and came back to a severely reduced post count, though. Sadness.

The user below is immortal.
